content: the 2016 cancer charity hat was designed specifically for the cancer challenge hosted by sweet potato 3 patterns **by downloading this pattern you are pledging to make a minimum of 1 hat from the pattern to donate to a cancer patient ** the pattern has sizes for children up to adult it works up quickly with a k hook and bulky weight yarn the bulky yarns is soft to the head and is warm for the cold winter days ahead please join me in my challenge to find out more information on the cancer challenge visit www sweetpotato3 com or www facebook com/sweetpotato3patterns
